featured.text: According to this passage, what did Marian Anderson do between 1917 and 1929?
Marian Anderson (1897-1993) was an African American woman who gained fame as a concert singer in this climate of racism.

definition.zh_def: 與聖母瑪利亞有關的，或是以瑪利亞命名的。
definition.en_def: Relating to the Virgin Mary or named after her.
definition.example: The Marian festival celebrates the life and virtues of the Virgin Mary.
